entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
